text: Cythara glareosa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae. This species is considered a nomen dubium. ==Description== The length of the shell attains 5 mm, its diameter 2 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off South Africa; in the Indian Ocean; off Hong Kong. ==References== ==External links== * Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682: 1–1295. * Smithsonian Institution: Mangelia glareosa * R.I. Johnson, The Recent Mollusca of Augustus Addison Gould; United States National Museum, bulletin 239, Washington D.C. 1964 glareosa Category:Gastropods described in 1860
title: Cythara glareosa
